sourcesContent:
import "./current-weather.css"; const CurrentWeather = ({data}) => { return (

{data.city}

{data.weather[0].description}

{Math.round(data.main.temp)}°C

Details
Feels like {Math.round(data.main.feels_like)}°C
Wind 2m/s SSW
Humidity 80%
Pressure 850 hPa
); } export default CurrentWeather;
